mapper.select: SELECT LC.LEC_CD, LC.LEC_HCNT, LC.LEC_STAT, LA.LECA_CD, LA.APP_CD, LA.DEP_CD, LA.ROOM_CD, LA.PRO_CD, LA.LECA_YEAR, LA.LECA_SEM, LA.LECA_NM, LA.LECA_CON, LA.LECA_TRG, LA.LECA_CRD, LA.LECA_PER, LA.LECA_CAP, LA.LECA_SCHE, LA.LECA_BOOK, LA.LECA_NOTE, LA.LECA_EVA, LA.LECA_TEMP, LA.LECA_STDT, LA.LECA_EDDT, LA.LECA_TYPE, P.PRO_JOIN, P.PRO_RET, P.PRO_POS, U.USER_CD, U.FILE_CD, U.USER_NM, U.USER_NME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_ZIP, U.USER_ADDR1, U.USER_ADDR2, U.USER_REG1, U.USER_REG2, U.USER_MAIL, U.USER_PASS, U.USER_BANK, U.USER_DEPO, U.USER_ACC, D.COL_CD, D.DEP_NM, D.DEP_MRC, D.DEP_MOC, D.DEP_CRC, D.DEP_COC, D.DEP_CAP, D.DEP_TEL, D.DEP_FEE, A.APP_YN, A.APP_REG, A.APP_PRODT, A.APP_RET, A.APP_PCD FROM LECTURE LC JOIN LECTURE_APPLY LA ON LC.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD JOIN PROFESSOR P ON LA.PRO_CD = P.PRO_CD JOIN USERS U ON P.PRO_CD = U.USER_CD JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON LA.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD JOIN APPROVAL A ON U.USER_CD = A.USER_CD AND LA.APP_CD = A.APP_CD WHERE LA.PRO_CD = #{proCd} AND ( (LA.LECA_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) AND LA.LECA_SEM = 1 AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) <= 6) OR (LA.LECA_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) AND LA.LECA_SEM = 2 AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) BETWEEN 8 AND 12) )

SELECT LC.LEC_CD, LC.LEC_HCNT, LC.LEC_STAT,
LA.LECA_CD, LA.APP_CD, LA.DEP_CD, LA.ROOM_CD, LA.LECA_YEAR, LA.LECA_SEM, LA.LECA_NM, LA.LECA_CON, LA.LECA_TRG, LA.LECA_CRD, LA.LECA_PER, LA.LECA_CAP, LA.LECA_SCHE, LA.LECA_BOOK, LA.LECA_NOTE, LA.LECA_EVA, LA.LECA_TEMP, LA.LECA_STDT, LA.LECA_EDDT, LA.LECA_TYPE,
P.PRO_CD, P.PRO_JOIN, P.PRO_RET, P.PRO_POS,
U.USER_CD, U.FILE_CD, U.USER_NM, U.USER_NME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_ZIP, U.USER_ADDR1, U.USER_ADDR2, U.USER_REG1, U.USER_REG2, U.USER_MAIL, U.USER_PASS, U.USER_BANK, U.USER_DEPO, U.USER_ACC,
D.COL_CD, D.DEP_NM, D.DEP_MRC, D.DEP_MOC, D.DEP_CRC, D.DEP_COC, D.DEP_CAP, D.DEP_TEL, D.DEP_FEE,
A.APP_YN, A.APP_REG, A.APP_PRODT, A.APP_RET, A.APP_PCD FROM LECTURE LC, LECTURE_APPLY LA, PROFESSOR P, USERS U, DEPARTMENT D, APPROVAL A WHERE 1 = 1 AND LC.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD AND LA.PRO_CD = P.PRO_CD AND LA.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD AND P.PRO_CD = U.USER_CD AND U.USER_CD = A.USER_CD AND LA.APP_CD = A.APP_CD AND LC.LEC_CD = #{lecCd}

SELECT ENR_CD, STU_CD, E.LEC_CD, ENR_REG, LEC_HCNT, LEC_STAT, LECA_NM, PRO_CD, LECA_TYPE, USER_NM, LECS_CD, LS.LEC_CD, LEC_DAY, LECS_STDT, LECS_EDDT FROM ENROLMENT E, LECTURE L, LECTURE_APPLY LA, USERS U, LECTURE_SCHEDULE LS WHERE E.LEC_CD = L.LEC_CD AND L.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD AND LA.PRO_CD = U.USER_CD AND E.LEC_CD = LS.LEC_CD AND LA.LECA_TRG = #{stuYear} AND LA.LECA_SEM = #{stuSem} AND E.STU_CD = #{stuCd}

SELECT E.ENR_CD, E.LEC_CD, E.ENR_REG, S.DEP_CD, S.COMD_CD, S.STU_YEAR, S.STU_CD, S.STU_SEM, S.STU_MRC, S.STU_MOC, S.STU_CRC, S.STU_COC, S.STU_ADDT, S.STU_GRDT, U.USER_CD, U.USER_NM, U.USER_NME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_ZIP, U.USER_ADDR1, U.USER_ADDR2, U.USER_REG1, U.USER_REG2, U.USER_MAIL, D.DEP_NM
FROM ENROLMENT E JOIN LECTURE L ON E.LEC_CD = L.LEC_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN STUDENT S ON E.STU_CD = S.STU_CD JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON S.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD JOIN USERS U ON S.STU_CD = U.USER_CD WHERE L.LEC_CD = #{lecCd} ORDER BY U.USER_NM

SELECT L.LEC_CD, LEC_HCNT, LEC_STAT, LECA_CD, PRO_CD, APP_CD, DEP_CD, ROOM_CD, LECA_YEAR, LECA_SEM, LECA_NM, LECA_CON, LECA_TRG, LECA_CRD, LECA_PER, LECA_CAP, LECA_SCHE, LECA_BOOK, LECA_NOTE, LECA_EVA, LECA_TEMP, LECA_STDT, LECA_EDDT, LECA_TYPE, LECS_CD, LEC_DAY, LECS_STDT, LECS_EDDT FROM LECTURE L, LECTURE_APPLY LA, LECTURE_SCHEDULE LS WHERE L.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD AND LS.LEC_CD = L.LEC_CD AND LA.LECA_YEAR = #{year} AND LA.LECA_SEM = #{sem} AND LA.PRO_CD = #{userCd}

SELECT L.LEC_CD, LEC_HCNT, LEC_STAT, LECA_CD, PRO_CD, APP_CD, DEP_CD, ROOM_CD, LECA_YEAR, LECA_SEM, LECA_NM, LECA_CON, LECA_TRG, LECA_CRD, LECA_PER, LECA_CAP, LECA_SCHE, LECA_BOOK, LECA_NOTE, LECA_EVA, LECA_TEMP, LECA_STDT, LECA_EDDT, LECA_TYPE, LECS_CD, LEC_DAY, LECS_STDT, LECS_EDDT FROM LECTURE L, LECTURE_APPLY LA, LECTURE_SCHEDULE LS WHERE L.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD AND LS.LEC_CD = L.LEC_CD AND LA.LECA_YEAR = #{lecaYear} AND LA.LECA_SEM = #{lecaSem} AND LA.PRO_CD = #{proCd}

SELECT LC.LEC_CD, LC.LEC_HCNT, LC.LEC_STAT, LA.LECA_CD, LA.APP_CD, LA.DEP_CD, LA.ROOM_CD, LA.PRO_CD, LA.LECA_YEAR, LA.LECA_SEM, LA.LECA_NM, LA.LECA_CON, LA.LECA_TRG, LA.LECA_CRD, LA.LECA_PER, LA.LECA_CAP, LA.LECA_SCHE, LA.LECA_BOOK, LA.LECA_NOTE, LA.LECA_EVA, LA.LECA_TEMP, LA.LECA_STDT, LA.LECA_EDDT, LA.LECA_TYPE, P.PRO_JOIN, P.PRO_RET, P.PRO_POS, U.USER_CD, U.FILE_CD, U.USER_NM, U.USER_NME, U.USER_TEL, U.USER_ZIP, U.USER_ADDR1, U.USER_ADDR2, U.USER_REG1, U.USER_REG2, U.USER_MAIL, U.USER_PASS, U.USER_BANK, U.USER_DEPO, U.USER_ACC, D.COL_CD, D.DEP_NM, D.DEP_MRC, D.DEP_MOC, D.DEP_CRC, D.DEP_COC, D.DEP_CAP, D.DEP_TEL, D.DEP_FEE, A.APP_YN, A.APP_REG, A.APP_PRODT, A.APP_RET, A.APP_PCD FROM LECTURE LC JOIN LECTURE_APPLY LA ON LC.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD JOIN PROFESSOR P ON LA.PRO_CD = P.PRO_CD JOIN USERS U ON P.PRO_CD = U.USER_CD JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON LA.DEP_CD = D.DEP_CD JOIN APPROVAL A ON U.USER_CD = A.USER_CD AND LA.APP_CD = A.APP_CD WHERE LA.PRO_CD = #{proCd} AND ( (LA.LECA_YEAR < EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)) OR (LA.LECA_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) AND LA.LECA_SEM < CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) <= 6 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) )

SELECT L.LEC_CD,
LA.LECA_NM
FROM LECTURE L JOIN LECTURE_APPLY LA ON L.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD WHERE LA.PRO_CD = #{proCd} AND ( (LA.LECA_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) AND LA.LECA_SEM = 1 AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) <= 6) OR (LA.LECA_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) AND LA.LECA_SEM = 2 AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) BETWEEN 8 AND 12) )

SELECT L.LEC_CD,
LA.LECA_NM
FROM ENROLMENT E JOIN LECTURE L ON E.LEC_CD = L.LEC_CD JOIN LECTURE_APPLY LA ON L.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD WHERE E.STU_CD = #{stuCd} AND ( (LA.LECA_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) AND LA.LECA_SEM = 1 AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) <= 6) OR (LA.LECA_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) AND LA.LECA_SEM = 2 AND EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) BETWEEN 8 AND 12) )

SELECT L.LEC_CD,
LA.LECA_NM
FROM LECTURE L JOIN LECTURE_APPLY LA ON L.LEC_CD = LA.LECA_CD WHERE LA.PRO_CD = #{proCd} AND ( (LA.LECA_YEAR < EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)) OR (LA.LECA_YEAR = EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE) AND LA.LECA_SEM < CASE WHEN EXTRACT(MONTH FROM SYSDATE) <= 6 THEN 1 ELSE 2 END) )
SELECT LECA_NM FROM LECTURE_APPLY WHERE LECA_CD = #{lecCd}
